topline_md: In recent NYC news, a hit-and-run incident involving a yellow cab resulted in a man's death, while immigration arrests surged; additionally, a boat crash injured three, and former mayor Rudy Giuliani was hospitalized after a crash, highlighting ongoing safety and political concerns in the city.
